Required details: IDMS DBA - Application level DB experience - record structure changes; creating indexes; planning and executing large installs that include database, online, and batch changes; DB monitoring; building copying CVs, backup restoresIDMS Programming - IDMS internal security; heavy experience with ADS online code - Dialogs, Maps, and Applications, ADSALIVE and other debuggingOther helpful experience:CA Endevor - administration or at least heavy user experience including problem resolutionASG Replication Suite - probably will be difficult to find, fortunately we rarely perform updatesASG Virtual Database - basic understanding of how it worksCA-7 - CA-11 scheduling tools Description-IDMS DBA - Application level DB experience - record structure changes; creating indexes; planning and executing large installs that include database, online, and batch changes; DB monitoring; building copying CVs, backup restores IDMS Programming - IDMS internal security; heavy experience with ADS online code - Dialogs, Maps, and Applications, ADSALIVE and other debugging Other helpful experience: CA Endeavor - administration or at least heavy user experience including problem resolution ASG Replication Suite - probably will be difficult to find, fortunately we rarely perform updates ASG Virtual Database - basic understanding of how it worksCA-7 - CA-11 scheduling tools
